content: I'm looking to get some new lighting for my home office. I recently moved my desk near the window, but I need a better task lamp to supplement the natural light. Can you recommend some options with higher wattage bulbs or maybe a floor lamp that would work well in a home office setting? By the way, I just replaced the bulb in my bedroom table lamp about three weeks ago, and it's made a huge difference - I went with a soft white LED bulb from IKEA.
